00039 
00045    enum connectionType_t {
00046       undefined = 0,  // undefined in data
00047       connection = 1, // E.g. a route number that takes the driver to a 
00048                       // destination.
00049       destination = 2,// The actual destination information.
00050       exit = 3,       // Exit information, e.g. exit number or name.
00051 
00052       unsetConnectionType = 0xff // Highest value
00053    };
00054 
00060    enum elementType_t {

00064       placeName = 3,
00065       exitNumber = 4,
00066       exitName = 5,
00067       otherDestination = 6,
00068       pictogram = 7
00069    };
